p: Medicinal plants remain one of the potent sources of human health due to the bioactive compounds that are responsible for their various pharmacological activities. A. muricata is a traditional medicinal plant that has been reported to possess acetogenins as major phytoconstituents [ 38]. These chemical compounds have been shown to exhibit various biological activities including the cytotoxic effect against the neoplastic cells which suggested their potential use as an antitumor agent [ 39].
